ProfessionalSummary:
Innovative Graphic Designer with hands-on experience creative thinking and project design abilities. Proven track record of designing signage, promotion materials, digital painting, video editing product as well as catalog photography. Ability to bring simultaneous graphic design projects to completion with complete efficiency and accuracy. Adept at designing high level layout, logos, typography, and illustration. Exceptional collaborative and interpersonal skills
 dynamic team player with well-developed written and verbal communication abilities. Extensive knowledge of layout principles and esthetic design concepts. Highly skilled in client and vendor relations and negotiations
 talented at building and maintaining "win-win" partnerships.

Name.Raw: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design

Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design

ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in:  Graphic Design (Software); and Information Technology (Machine Learning).    ~~~~~~~~~   has 13 years of work experience.

Positions.Description:
Delivered expertise in designing as well as upgrading manuals for pilot and provide effective aircraft mechanic training by using multiple software, including Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Power-Point.

• Assisted in designing training manuals material for classroom as well as for online learning, including vector graphics, line art of engines and flight systems, and formatting text.

Rendered outstanding expertise in décor and designing signage for convenience stores and trade show booths to maximize overall strategy and generate more leads around business. Contributed in designing vinyl wraps graphics for soda fountain towers. Delivered expertise in designing illumine signage for various items, including fountain machines, Atm, restrooms as well as prepared custom vinyl graphics for walls.
• Improved efficiency by developing conceptual design for exchanging neon with LED for brighter signs.

Delivered exceptional services as graphic designer for designing promotional items for company t-shirts, flyers, and other promotional material to engage both listeners and potential clients. Optimized website efficiency by providing assistance in maintaining and updating company websites. Interacted with clients and listeners by engaging in and filming/photographing station events.
• Contributed in designing different promotional material, including t-shirts, flyers, billboards, posters, banners, banner ads as well as assisted in shooting/editing for CBS Radio DFW cluster.

Maintained high standards in photography for company website and catalogs. Improved audio as well as video quality by executing ADR sessions for various Funimation licenses properties, including Dragon Ball Z as well as delivered expertise in rotoscoping editing for TV, shot/directed bonus video material.
• Delivered assistance in conducting photography for in house company IF labs and Funimation store catalogs.

Skills.Name: Excellent Written and Verbal Communication Skills

QualificationsSummary:
Technical Proficiencies
Tools: Adobe Photoshop, Light Room, Illustrator, InDesign, Premier Pro, MS Office
